message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I'm willing to pay that amount for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $930000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $910000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that $910000 is the right price for this exceptional product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $915000 to feel comfortable selling it to you.
I'm still very interested in the product, but I'm trying to be responsible with my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you've mentioned.
